Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 67th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temp. rerouted WB: 67th, Stony Island, Marquette, Rhodes & 67th; EB: 67th, Saint Lawrence, Marquette, Stony Island & 67th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 67th/Cottage Grove due to police activity.

Westbound buses will operate via 67th, Stony Island, Marquette, Rhodes, then resume their normal route on 67th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 67th, Saint Lawrence, Marquette, Stony Island, then resume their normal route on 67th.

Allow extra travel time.
